name: Boiling of Water
description:
Uncle Mamerto's lifestyle is still traditional, every visitor to his place was shocked and amazed because he mean what he was saying by actively doing it "walk the talk". In Uncle Mamerto's term, his life is everyday camping. 
Part of Crossing borders Projects
It aims to creatively tell stories and do an alternative archiving of the way of life, culture, and traditions. 

Medium: gifart, animation /
768 x 432 / Year: 2022

Artist: @island_indio
